mapper.select: select id, employee_id, department_id, leave_time, leave_days, type, leave_reason, approval_status from leave_request left join hr.leave_type lt on leave_request.type_id = lt.type_id where employee_id = #{employeeId}
select department_id from employee where employee_id =#{employeeId}

select id, employee_id, department_id, leave_time, leave_days, type, leave_reason, approval_status from leave_request left join hr.leave_type lt on leave_request.type_id = lt.type_id where department_id = #{departmentId}
mapper.insert: insert into leave_request(employee_id, department_id, leave_time, leave_days, type_id, leave_reason, approval_status) values (#{employeeId},#{departmentId},#{leaveTime},#{leaveDays},#{typeId},#{leaveReason},#{approvalStatus})
mapper.update: update leave_request set approval_status = #{approvalStatus} where id = #{id}
